knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

## Setup libraries and data



```{r setup_libraries_and_data, collapse = TRUE}
library(rio)
library(tibble)
library(here)
library(lme4)
library(ggplot2)
library(sjPlot)
library(aws.s3)
theme_set(theme_sjplot())
dir.create(file.path("data-raw"))
setwd(here("data-raw"))
save_object(object = "data-raw/popular.dta",
  bucket = "continuous-report-delivery-public", region = "us-east-2",
  check_region = FALSE)
setwd(here())
data_raw <- as_tibble(import(here("data-raw/popular.dta")))
```

## View the head of the dataset

```{r data_raw}
data_raw
```
## Statistical analysis


```{r multilevel_model}
model_1 <- lmer(popular ~ sex + texp + sex * texp + (1 + sex | school), 
  data = data_raw)
summary(model_1)
plot_model(model_1, sort.est = TRUE)
ggplot(data_raw, aes(x=sex, y=popular, group=school))+
  stat_smooth(method="lm", se=FALSE, size=.5, color="springgreen") + 
  stat_smooth(aes(group=1), method="lm", color="blue", size=1.5 )
```
